info.description:
<dmsdk/dlib/configfile.h>

Configuration file access functions. The configuration file is compiled version of the game.project file.
info.name: ConfigFile

elements.description: Get config value as float, returns default if the key isn't found Note: default_value is returned for invalid float values

parameters.doc: const char* Key in format section.key (.key for no section)
parameters.name: key

parameters.doc: float Default value to return if key isn't found
parameters.name: default_value

returnvalues.doc: float found value or default value
returnvalues.name: value

elements.name: dmConfigFile::GetFloat

elements.description: Get config value as int, returns default if the key isn't found Note: default_value is returned for invalid integer values

parameters.doc: const char* Key in format section.key (.key for no section)
parameters.name: key

parameters.doc: int32_t Default value to return if key isn't found
parameters.name: default_value

returnvalues.doc: int32_t found value or default value
returnvalues.name: value

elements.name: dmConfigFile::GetInt

elements.description: Get config value as string, returns default if the key isn't found

parameters.doc: const char* Key in format section.key (.key for no section)
parameters.name: key

parameters.doc: const char* Default value to return if key isn't found
parameters.name: default_value

returnvalues.doc: const char* found value or default value
returnvalues.name: value

elements.name: dmConfigFile::GetString

elements.description: typedef struct Config* HConfig;
elements.name: dmConfigFile::HConfig
